name: Haywood
description:
A game developed for the "Otter Jam 2021" game jam. with the theme was "Heart of the Forest". The game's development started on October 13th, 2021 and finished October 24th, 2021.

Big thanks to:

  • Finigini
  • Zero
  • Noahffense
  • Brandon
  • Pyrospirit
  • Foxtrotting62
  • RedPandaMochi

For playtesting and giving me really good feedback!

Credits:
